abstract: These days, Cisco is peddling e-mail software, video conferencing systems, cable TV boxes, and other products known as unified communications.
snippet: These days, Cisco is peddling e-mail software, video conferencing systems, cable TV boxes, and other products known as unified communications.
lead_paragraph: SAN JOSE, Calif.  Forget the switches and routers that built Cisco Systems into a giant, albeit somewhat boring, company at the core of the Internet.

headline.main: Cisco Tries to Break Out of the Data Center Role
headline.print_headline: Cisco Tries to Break Out Of the Data Center Role
